name: OpenFarm
longDescription: A comprehensive platform for managing multiple 3D printers, including job scheduling, monitoring, and analytics. Made for the University of Utah, open source, and community-driven.
achievements: Managing large-scale 3D printer farms for the University of Utah Eccle's Health Science Library
Eliminated unpaid print starts by driving payment compliance to 0% unpaid jobs (previously jobs could start before payment), resolving a critical operational issue for the University of Utah
Automated job scheduling and GCode validation
